content.text:
# Draft:Leteipa the King

| origin          = Loitokitok, Kajiado County, Kenya
| genres          = Afropop, Afro‑R&B, reggae
| occupations     = Singer-songwriter, guitarist, rapper, actor, scriptwriter, teacher
| instruments     = Vocals, guitar
| years_active    = 2018–present
| labels          = Vampk254 Music
| associated_acts = Anne Njeri; Major Lannoh; DreamBoy; Shanny Cool; Muna Party; Pop Karly; Bonnie Winsome
}}
Kelvin Leteipa Nyamao (born 6 August 1996), known by his stage name Leteipa the King (also as Vampk254), is a Kenyan Afropop singer-songwriter, guitarist, rapper, scriptwriter, actor, and teacher. He was born in Loitokitok, Kajiado County, and continues to live in the region 1.
Early life and career
Leteipa began writing music inspired by Maasai culture and life in Kajiado. Professionally, he is also a school teacher and a volunteer with VSO Kenya 2.
Musical career
Performing under his own label, Vampk254 Music, Leteipa's discography includes many independently-released singles and a 2022 digital album, *Teipas tales*, featuring collaborations with DreamBoy, Shanny Cool, Major Lannoh, Muna Party, Bonnie Winsome, and Pop Karly 3.
Notable releases
* *Teipas tales* (digital album, 14 January 2022) — includes the title track and "Born Perfect", "Propeller", "Tenga" 4.
* Singles:
* “Baki na mimi” (May 2020) 5
* “Waridi” (June 2021) 6
* “They were there” (2022), “Volunteer” (Dec 2023), “Bangi na supu” (Mar 2023), “I pray” featuring Anne Njeri (Jan 2024), and “Together” 7.
Leteipa is described by fans as “purest musician” with “deep vocals” and authentic storytelling rooted in his lived experience 8.
Other work
In addition to music, Leteipa is a teacher by trade and actively engages in community service through volunteer work with organizations like VSO Kenya 9.
Recognition
* Nominated, Gusii Creative Awards 2020 — Fast-Rising Male Artist 10
* Nominated, Eastern Talanta Awards 2021 — Personality of the Year 11
External links
* [https://leteipatheking2.bandcamp.com Official Bandcamp]
* [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxt7khMnQhQ65Bfck5bCesQ YouTube channel]
* [https://www.instagram.com/leteipatheking Instagram]
* [https://soundcloud.com/leteipa-kevinie SoundCloud]
